product_description: This delicate collar necklace has a wire-wrapped chain decorated with semiprecious stones and a briolette centerpiece.
product_details_and_care:
This delicate collar necklace has a wire-wrapped chain decorated with semiprecious stones and a briolette centerpiece.
14" length; 2" extender
Lobster clasp closure
Sterling silver with gold or black-rhodium plate/silverite, tourmaline, labradorite, turquoise, pyrite, opal, kyanite or topaz
Made in the USA
Item #5457755
